name: Bearing Golem
description: The Bearing Golem resembles a collection of ball bearings that can scatter and reform, with a sleek, metallic appearance that belies its agility and stealth.
memorable: Its ability to reform and scatter creates unique tactical opportunities in combat, allowing it to evade attacks and surprise opponents.
goals: Typically acts as a sentinel or trap, making it useful in guarding locations or ambushing unsuspecting intruders.
relations: It may be created and controlled by a skilled artisan or wizard familiar with construct crafting.
environment: Commonly found in cleverly designed areas, such as workshops or places where traps are set.
strengths: Immunity to many conditions and damage types, excellent stealth capabilities, and a unique ability to scatter and reform.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to adamantine weapons for piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage.
attacks: Can perform multiattacks with slam attacks or fire Steel Shot, delivering significant bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Scattershot ability detonation can wreak havoc on opponents near it, dealing massive damage and knocking them prone.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and tremorsense up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect movement and presence in its vicinity.
skills: Skilled in Stealth and Perception, making it highly effective in ambush situations.
additional_information: Can create an effective area control situation using its Scatter ability.
Has advantage on attack rolls against surprised creatures.
Its immutable form provides resilience in the face of magic.
It can hide in plain sight among ball bearings when it scatters.
Regenerates its cohesive form even after taking damage.
